data: TM AMB Red Blood Cell (RBC) and Platelet Transfusion Twice Weekly for 1 month (Day of Treatment)
Patient Care
Insert Peripheral IV Catheter
Blood Products
Red Blood Cells
Group and screen required. (Sample expires every 3 days at 2359h on the third day following date of collection)
Special requirements (e.g. irradiated) must be identified for red blood cell and platelet transfusion orders. For instructions for special requirements consult linked resource

Consider patient history:  1. Known blood antibodies (antibody card)  2. Blood disorder or a blood cancer such as leukemia, lymphoma, or myeloma  3. Transplant procedure  4. Immune deficiency disorder  5. Pregnancy within 90 days
Blood Product Fact Sheet
Conditional Red Blood Cell Transfusion
Routine, IV, Administer each over: 120 - 180 Minutes, Start date T;N

Platelets
Order in doses. One adult dose is equivalent to 4 pooled units or 1 apheresis unit
Blood Product Fact Sheet - Pooled or apheresis platelets
Blood Product Fact Sheet - HLA matched platelets
Conditional Platelet Transfusion
Cond. 1:If platelet count Less Than 20 (x10^9/L), then transfuse 1 doses, Routine, IV, Administer each over: 60 - 90 Minutes, Adult Dose, Start date T;N
Administer - Platelet Transfusion orders are for clinic nurse use only
Administer - Platelet Transfusion
Administer: 1 Dose, IV, Administer each over: 60 - 90 Minutes

Conditional Order - One Time
If/when Platelet tranfusion completed, then Nurse to place lab order for post platelet count 1 hour post transfusion
Medications
furosemide
20 mg, IV, once, drug form: inj
40 mg, IV, once, drug form: inj
furosemide
20 mg, IV, once, drug form: inj
40 mg, IV, once, drug form: inj
furosemide
20 mg, IV, once, drug form: inj
40 mg, IV, once, drug form: inj
PRN Medications ONLY for patients with history of clinically significant transfusion reactions
diphenhydrAMINE
25 mg, IV, once, PRN allergy symptoms, drug form: inj
50 mg, IV, once, PRN allergy symptoms, drug form: inj
hydrocortisone
50 mg, IV, once, PRN allergy symptoms, drug form: inj
100 mg, IV, once, PRN allergy symptoms, drug form: inj
250 mg, IV, once, PRN allergy symptoms, drug form: inj
Post Transfusion Line Flush
sodium chloride 0.9% (NS) bolus
50 mL, IV, once, PRN other (see comment), drug form: bag
